trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around July 15th 2009
Summary: Three-sided hollow pyramid craft hovering above the treetops.
divs: sighting detailsit was during the month of july, 2009 when this happened. although i'm unsure of the exact day, i do know this is the exact month because i was driving to tullahoma, tennessee to pick up my aunt for a late viewing of the ice age 3 movie at the local theater. i was driving on i-24w toward nashville; i took exit 111 into manchester to drive onto tullahoma. after one exits 111, to get to this destination, there is another left, then straight drive into tullahoma. right after i made the left turn, i saw a hovering pyramid above the treetops. it was stationary in its hovering; it did not rotate or ascend at all. i didn't have a camera, nor a cell phone that would've taken a good enough picture, but i am an artist and i made sure to get a good look at the flying object so that i could draw it later on. i knew it was a ufo at first sight of it as i am keen on paranormal subjects; it did not frighten me, but it was shocking to witness and hard continue my concentration on driving my car. the object was a three-sided pyramid. it was a metallic, shiny black color. on the first side i saw, there were 10 circular white lights, stacked in rows (4, 3, 2, 1). the best way i can describe these lights is to compare them to the lights that overlook a baseball game. on the next side, i looked back to see three small lights near its top, each different colors- red, green, and blue. none of the lights pulsed but the 10 white ones were especially bright. i was topping a hill when i first saw it and after crossing it, i could see underneath the craft; it was hollow. the craft was hovering just above the treetops, i'd say about six to eight feet above the leaves. on the opposite side of the median\road, cars were pulling over. on my side of the road, all of us were slamming our brakes and two cars ahead of me, there was nearly a wreck. this was proof to me that i wasn't the only one witnessing this. the craft was about 20ft wide and was a proportional triangle on each side, so perhaps about 20ft tall as well. as i've said, the craft was hollow. i have provided an illustration as i saw it. in the illustration: figure 1: shows the first side that i saw with the ten white lights stacked in a triangular shape. figure 2: shows the second side that i saw when i looked back at the craft; it had three smaller, multi-colored lights. figure 3: shows how the craft looked as if standing further back from it, putting both pieces together. figure 4: shows the underside of the craft; as i passed it, i could see up into it, that it was hollow. i have also submitted a map of where the scene took place. the green dot indicates the exact place where i saw the craft. i only watched the craft as long as it took for the traffic to continue moving forward. there was no immediate place to turn around or i would've come back to the opposite side of the road and pulled over as some other cars were doing.
